newsitem.title: USA: Chateau Properties says to buy back stock.
newsitem.headline: Chateau Properties says to buy back stock.

text.p: Chateau Properties Inc said Wednesday it plans to commence the repurchase of up to 450,000 shares of its common stock.
These repurchases would be made by way of open market or privately negotiated purchases, Chateau said.

Following the vote of the shareholders of ROC Communities Inc on the proposed merger of the manufactured home community operators, Chateau may repurchase up to an additional one million shares of its common stock by way of open market purchases, privately negotiated purchases or a tender offer.

"We first announced our intention to launch this repurchase program as part of our merger agreement with ROC Communities," Chateau chief executive Jeff Kellogg said in a statement. "In commencing the program, we are continuing toward the proposed combination of Chateau and ROC."
